document_data.name: Volo's Guide to the Vast
document_data.author: [[Volothamp Geddarm]]
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}{{Cite web enhancement/The Leaves of Learning|5}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Volo's Guide to the Vast''''' was a book written by [[Volothamp Geddarm]]. It was a travelogue about the lands of [[the Vast]]. It was written over [[1358 DR|1358]] to [[1360 DR]], but went officially unreleased.

Nevertheless, around [[1372 DR]], one copy was kept in the Tower of Tomes of the [[Leaves of Learning]], a temple to [[Oghma]] in [[Deepingdale]]. Another copy was in the holdings at [[Candlekeep]], and the original was held by someone in [[Ravens Bluff]].
